data.title: 8 Foreign Merchants in Early Modern Sweden: A Case of Intermarriage, Trade and Migration
data.meta_description: 8 Foreign Merchants in Early Modern Sweden: A Case of Intermarriage, Trade and Migration was published in Facing Otherness in Early Modern Sweden on page 145.
data.text:
